creator: pvdw@cendec.com
text:
A comment line like
<!-- blabla -- blabla -->
Causes
an error during a build.
Error msg is commend line should end with '>'
Replacing the comment by
<!-- blabla @@ blabla -->
Solves the problem.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
part of the XML specification, not ant. Take it up with the w3c if you have an 
isse.
